text: The Flemish Region of Belgium is divided into 300 municipalities, listed in the table below. The numbers refer to the location of the municipalities on the maps of the respective provinces. Effective 1 January 2019, fifteen municipalities were merged into seven, thus reducing the number of Flemish municipalities from 308 to 300: * Aalter + Knesselare = Aalter * Deinze + Nevele = Deinze * Kruishoutem + Zingem = Kruisem * Waarschoot + Lovendegem + Zomergem = Lievegem * Sint-Amands + Puurs = Puurs-Sint-Amands * Overpelt + Neerpelt = Pelt * Opglabbeek + Meeuwen-Gruitrode = Oudsbergen ==List== West Flanders East Flanders Antwerp Flemish Brabant Limburg The table and maps reflect the pre-2019 situation with 308 municipalities. {|class="wikitable sortable"
